project.description:
This is the main and only 1 script to generate the EOL stats. This will trigger 6 instances of the connector. The last one will proceed with finalizing the report.
The other [Generate by range 1,2,3 & 4] are only supplementary to speed up or further divide the load. These are helpful indeed but not required.
The other [Conn 1,2,3,4 & 5] are those old manual means of running the connector. These can be deleted.

hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # 20th day of every month H H 20 1-12 *

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #cd /Library/WebServer/Documents/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors php5.6 run.php jenkins '{"connector":"eol_v3_api.php", "divisor":8, "task":"initial"}' ##originally divisor set to 6
